creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: skeleton with ghoulish, grinning face in dance pose; standing on PL leg, with PR leg bent behind; PR arm extended in front of body, with hand clutching a red seal; PL arm curved up around head
marks: Signature and Seals Bottom right: [ 土井恪作 ] {Doi Kaku saku}
title: Skeleton
